topic1.message: I think Kerala is stuck, we need business focus to succeed.
Business can drive wealth, but culture also adds value.
Culture hinders growth; wealth trumps family ties.

topic2.message: My family wants me to join the arts, but I know business is my path.
Balancing personal goals with family expectations can be challenging.
I’ll ignore their wishes; success demands sacrifice.

metadata.demographics: Hindu born in Kottayam, who is 30 years old. Born to a rich family, went to the best schools in kerala and in the US.
metadata.beliefs: Believes kerala is behind in the world scene, believes kerala culture is bad, believes business is the way to build wealth, believes wealth is true success, believes family & relationships comes in the way of success
